original_text: Ye shall not make yourselves abominable with any creeping thing that creepeth, neither shall ye make yourselves unclean with them, that ye should be defiled thereby.
korean_text: 너희는 기는 바 기어다니는 것 때문에 자기를 가증하게 되게 하지 말며 또한 그것 때문에 스스로 더럽혀 부정하게 되게 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Ye shall not make yourselves abominable
with any creeping thing that creepeth
neither shall ye make yourselves unclean with them
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그것들로 스스로를 부정하게 만들지도 말라

sentences.original_text: that ye should be defiled thereby
